name: Racing Legend: Highspeed Car X
description:
Racing Legend: Highspeed Car X3 is an endless arcade racing. Try to be one of the fastest traffic racers in the global leaderboards. Game takes you on a long beautiful highway where you can drive as much as you can.
KEY FEATURES:
- Real physics
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Awesome Expensive cars to choose from
- 3 detailed environments: suburb, desert, and city night
